appName: Galaxy Defense VR – Space Shooting Game
displayName: Galaxy Defense VR – Space Shooting Game
display_name: Galaxy Defense VR – Space Shooting Game
display_long_description:
Prepare for an action-packed VR battle in Galaxy Defense VR – Space Shooting Game. You stand on a powerful space cruiser armed with futuristic weapons in both hands. Your mission: defend the galaxy from endless waves of enemy fighters, drones, and gigantic motherships that appear throughout the battle.

Experience immersive 360° combat as enemies attack from every direction. Move, aim, and shoot using dual-wield blasters, laser rifles, or rapid-fire cannons. Each wave increases in speed and intensity, pushing your reflexes and accuracy to the limit. Destroy swarms of small enemy ships, dodge incoming fire, and unleash heavy damage against massive boss-type motherships.

This game features an infinite wave system—the longer you survive, the more challenging and rewarding the gameplay becomes. Earn high scores, improve your skills, and compete against yourself in the ultimate space survival challenge.

With stunning visuals, smooth VR performance, and fast arcade-style shooting, Galaxy Defense VR delivers a simple yet highly addictive sci-fi combat experience perfect for all VR players.

Defend your ship. Protect the galaxy. Survive the invasion!
